titleStmt.title: William S. Bodley to Ephraim L. Van Winkle
CWG1856

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Louisville April 12th 1864
E L Vanwinkle Esq FrSec. State
Frankfort Ky

Dr Sir I am desired by Thomas N Easten Esq to solicit for him the appointment of Notary public for this county. Knowing you much better than I know the Governor and as it falls practically under your office I write you Mr Easten is a very intelligent & competent business man and needs the office in conjun^tion^ of ^with^ his transactions as connected with real estate &c and I hope you may procure it for him.
If advised that he will be appointed Mr E will send up the fees. Please write WSB to Tho N Easten Esq Louisville. W S B

Jefferson Co
N P
Thos N. Easten
apptd
12th Apl 1864
